Imagery Description: Seated woman with dish of eggs and mirror, in front of whom Eros bends forward over his right foot, which rests upon a tendril, with a mirror in his right hand and a phiale and a beadNon Sepcified wreath in his left; to right nude youth with thyrsus in right hand, wreath in left, leaning upon a stick. Below the handles: female heads.
Additional Notes: The shoulder is very flat and is decorated with berried laurelNon Sepcifiedwreaths meeting in a central flower; the body is squat, and the foot is in two degrees, as on no. 70. There is a single large palmette fan below the back handle and it is flanked by the typical framing palmettes. The small palmetteNon Sepcifiedscroll beside the seated woman is comparable to those on nos. 17, 70, 75, 95.
